description: A 10-year-old girl screaming after being pepper sprayed and surrounding protesters trying to help her. More info: https://twitter.com/greg_doucette/status/1269809534740189186

7 Seattle police showed up to arrest the man who took the video of the child sprayed with mace (in PB-0036). Police say they were arresting a person they suspected of using a laser pointer at protest, but the person said they took the video of the 10-year-old child the police maced downtown last weekend, and he feared this arrest was retributive. Pine and Belmont Ave

Police arrest a protestor using the same knee-on-neck technique used to murder #GeorgeFloyd. Another protestor yells \"GET YOUR FUCKING KNEE OFF HIS NECK\" – at which point the *other* officer forcibly moves the first officer's leg.
Seattle bike cop crashes into the back of a peaceful unarmed marcher, so other police swarm to arrest the marcher for some reason
Seattle bike cop deliberately tries to \"pass\" where there's clearly not enough room, so he can then make contact and put a protestor into a headlock
Protestors shout about the guy getting arrested after a bike cop deliberately crashed in to him, and SPD starts indiscriminately firing tear gas into the crowd
Police form a line to force protestors into a tight group against a wall (\"kettling\"), so they can then repeatedly pepper-spray them without anyone being able to leave.
Police appear to be trying to break the glass window of whatever business this is at 2nd and Pike.
Police shoot a teargas canister at a reporter – live on-air as she's reporting
Overhead view of Seattle PD pepper-spraying protestors, then indiscriminately firing flash bang grenades deep into the crowd

Street-level view of Seattle PD pepper-spraying protestors, then indiscriminately firing flash bang grenades deep into the crowd. The cops are rioting. [full video is 3:31 long, on IG @ https://instagram.com/tv/CA63KMnlVvu/?igshid=hfp3uoaqe23p]
A massive turnout to a Seattle protest against police brutality. *Years* of data – decades likely – have repeatedly proven that crackdowns radicalize people and lead to more protestors.
Police pre-beatings huddle caught on camera saying, \"Don't kill 'em. But hit 'em HARD!\"
Police use flash-bang and teargas indiscriminately on peaceful protestors (https://www.facebook.com/jessica.bundy.79/videos/3660489490632506/)

relatedEvents.description: Another angle on: Police use flash-bang and teargas indiscriminately on peaceful protestors (https://www.pscp.tv/gramsofgnats/1RDGlQAOZPrJL?t=24m9s)
Police use flash-bang and teargas indiscriminately on peaceful protestors. Note the person on a motorized scooter getting caught in a cloud of gas

description: Police deploy a busload of riot troops (at least 30 troopers) at a peaceful protest. Reminder: it's the police who have been escalating the violence
Protestors make a path for an ambulance to get to a medical emergency. Seattle Police refuse to let the ambulance through and the ambulance is forced to turn around.

Seattle PD dragging mother out of her car while her 9 year old is in the backseat. Officer tells her she has \"multiple counts of assaulting an officer. You assaulted me and you assaulted another officer\" at a protest couple days ago. More info: https://twitter.com/daeshikjr/status/1269328705752494081

relatedEvents.description: Another angle on: Seattle PD dragging mother out of her car while her 9 year old is in the backseat. Officer tells her she has \"multiple counts of assaulting an officer. You assaulted me and you assaulted another officer\" at a protest couple days ago. More info: https://twitter.com/daeshikjr/status/1269328705752494081

Another angle on: Seattle PD dragging mother out of her car while her 9 year old is in the backseat. Officer tells her she has \"multiple counts of assaulting an officer. You assaulted me and you assaulted another officer\" at a protest couple days ago. The police pepper spray the 9-year-old child as well. More info: https://twitter.com/daeshikjr/status/1269328705752494081

description: Police beat an unarmed protestor.

police ask a huge crowd to take 5 steps back – then when they realize it's impossible, they indiscriminately start pepper-spraying everyone. Notice the unlawful seizures of private property (umbrellas, a road cone). [@lovebarofficial]
Police fire blast balls and \"chemical agents\" to break up the protestor crowd on Capitol Hill.
More of: Police fire blast balls and \"chemical agents\" to break up the protestor crowd on Capitol Hill. This looks like an invading army.
Seattle police aggressively grab and escort a journalist, despite her repeatedly telling them that she was with the press.

relatedEvents.description: Seattle police aggressively grab and escort a journalist, despite her repeatedly telling them that she was with the press.

description: Seattle Police Department use flash bangs to disperse crowd, people throwing things at officers. A piece of one of those bangs hit the recorder's leg. (The recorder is a journalist with KOMONews). Protesters hadn’t thrown or done anything it seems to provoke this.

relatedEvents.description: Seattle Police Department use flash bangs to disperse crowd, people throwing things at officers. A piece of one of those bangs hit the recorder's leg. (The recorder is a journalist with KOMONews). Protesters hadn’t thrown or done anything it seems to provoke this.

Police continue pushing protestors back. Appears as though some people may be getting detained, really hard to tell in this chaos. Lots of people complaining of breathing in gas, having trouble seeing

Police are using lots of gas, it appears, as well as pepper balls. Police have also used flash bangs to clear 11th. Protestors are all the way past 10th now as officers continue moving towards the group

description: Seattle Police gives an order to disperse, but then uses their bike cops to prevent people from dispersing – and then shoots them when they don't. . [@MikeApe7]
Army National Guard getting in on the habit of refusing to wear name patches to identify themselves. Your Government wants to abuse you – anonymously. Lawlessness
Thread on SPD attacking a medic tent on 6/6-7: https://twitter.com/velaharigaming/status/1269685373816332289
6/7 protest descends into chaos. [@menilivne]
Police get super-aggressive with the tear gas.
A protestor is shot by Seattle police from 30 yards away while the media is broadcasting live.

A man drives into the crowd of protestors in downtown Seattle, shoots a guy as he gets out of the car, then makes his way through the crowd to the police to turn himself in. Later investigation shows that the shooter is cop-adjacent. The shooter's social media accounts were being wiped while he was supposedly in custody, according to those investigating. More information: https://twitter.com/spekulation/status/1270166241513095168?s=20 https://www.thestranger.com/slog/2020/06/07/43863540/man-brandishing-firearm-crashes-into-barrier-on-capitol-hill-cops-have-suspect-and-the-gun

description: At least 6 Seattle cops and National Guardsmen beat a lone homeless person.
Another angle on: At least 6 Seattle cops and National Guardsmen beat a lone homeless person.
Police shoot someone directly in the chest with a flash-bang grenade. [@chaseburnsy] More info: https://twitter.com/spekulation/status/1270114467024642050
A mashup of multiple cameras on, but notice the top left where SPD blows away a journalist
